deck.name: Tactical Repositioning
deck.description: Instantly transport a ship to an open area.

deck.name: Volley Fire
deck.description: Increase the area of your attack by 2 units in each direction.

deck.name: Repair Crew
deck.description: Instantly repair an unsunk ship to full health.

deck.name: Intelligence
deck.description: After your draw phase, reveal one of your opponent's cards at random.
